attributes.action: change the format of E-Petitions so disagreement can also be expressed
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The traditional petition by its very nature only expresses one side of the argument. In contrast an e-petition could easily allow people to disagree with a petition,giving a 'truer' reflection of public opinion. Surely the one-sided nature of a petition shouldn't be kept purely because it is the tradition.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
